channel.title: Business on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours
channel.description: Recent content in Business on Asterisk, and other worldly endeavours

item.title: LeifMadsen Enterprises, Inc. enters its 7th year of operation!
item.description: On this day in 2005, LeifMadsen Enterprises, Inc. was formally registered as an incorporation by the government of Canada! I’ve now been consulting on Asterisk professionally for over 6 years full time (and a few years before that!). I graduated from the telecommuncations technology program at Sheridan Institute of Technology in 2004. In that time I’ve spoken at every AstriCon since 2004 (the first one), and have helped write 4 books on the subject of Asterisk (The Future of Telephony 1st, 2nd editions, The Definitive Guide 3rd edition, Cookbook).
